    • Uses of DataSet in org.deeplearning4j.nn.graph

      Methods in org.deeplearning4j.nn.graph with parameters of type DataSet 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ComputationGraph.fit(DataSet dataSet)
      Fit the ComputationGraph using a DataSet.
      double ComputationGraph.score(DataSet dataSet)
      Sets the input and labels and returns a score for the prediction with respect to the true labels
      This is equivalent to ComputationGraph.score(DataSet, boolean) with training==true.
      double ComputationGraph.score(DataSet dataSet, boolean training)
      Sets the input and labels and returns a score for the prediction with respect to the true labels
      NOTE: this version of the score function can only be used with ComputationGraph networks that have a single input and a single output.
      INDArray ComputationGraph.scoreExamples(DataSet data, boolean addRegularizationTerms)
      Calculate the score for each example in a DataSet individually.

    • Uses of DataSet in org.nd4j.linalg.dataset

      Classes in org.nd4j.linalg.dataset that implement DataSet 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DataSet
      A data transform (example/outcome pairs) The outcomes are specifically for neural network encoding such that any labels that are considered true are 1s.
